item.description:
join us at playwright on temple street for the return of FLORIAN. he left us a few months ago to return to deutschland, but he said "I'll BE BACK!" and indeed he is. but no promises that he'll be completely (or even partially) clothed!

playwright is a great place to party, with an extensive sit-down bar area in the front, a dining area upstairs with a bar that's *usually* available to anyone after 10 or so, and a dance floor and standing-room only bar on the first floor in the back. supposedly there will be a band playing in front, too, starting at 10. some group called "straddle daddy." sounds gross, but hey.

for more info:
http://www.niteimage....

cover charge is $5, starting somewhere between 9:30 and 10 (this is what they told me...apparently it's arbitrary!)

your contact: ben (203) 554-5144



now is the time in the Collective when we dance!

ps to new folks...yep, there are some inside jokes here. but we're very friendly. really. come out and join in the fun
item.name: Ladies, start your biological watches...the Naked German is back in town!
